subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Valenzuela, known as Milo, won the Kentucky Derby and rode the five-time horse of the year Kelso in the 1960s.
snippet: Mr. Valenzuela, known as Milo, won the Kentucky Derby and rode the five-time horse of the year Kelso in the 1960s.
